text: Hermine Rudersdorf Hermine Küchenmeister-Rudersdorf, née Rudersdorf, also Rudersdorff, born 30 November (12 December Old Style) 1822 in Ivanowsky, Russian Empire – 25 February 1882 in Boston) was a German singer, composer and voice teacher.Hermine Küchenmeister-Rudersdorf (in German) Kalliope-Verbund == References == == Sources == * Küchenmeister (Hermine) née Rudersdorff. In Carl Heinrich Herzel: Schlesisches Tonkünstler-Lexikon. 4 volume, Trewendt, Breslau 1846/1847, * Ludwig Eisenberg: Großes biographisches Lexikon der Deutschen Bühne im XIX. Jahrhundert. Paul List, Leipzig 1903, . == External links == * * Category:1822 births Category:1882 deaths Category:German singers Category:Voice teachers Category:German emigrants to the United States
title: Hermine Küchenmeister-Rudersdorf
